Segmentation Property¶

class SegmentationProperty.SegmentationProperty(points, segments)[source]¶

Holds segments.

Each segment represented by an integer in range (0, nSegments). The segment -1 is used for unsegmented points Can hold result of filter.

In this case Count is 2, and segments has values of 0 and 1. (Consider inheritance for convenience).

Attributes

NumberOfSegments
Points Holds the points dataset
RGB
Raster Holds raster dataset
Size Return the size of the property
path The path of the dataset

Methods

GetAllSegments()
GetSegment(label) Return a PointSubSet object from the points in segment labeled “label” in case there are no points with the given label return None (and NOT an empty SubSet)
GetSegmentIndices(label)
UpdatePointLabel(pointIndex, newLabel) Change the label of a certain point.
_BaseProperty__getPointProperty(idx) Retrieve the point property (object or value) of a specific point
getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
load(**kwargs) Loads all values of a property.
GetAllSegments()[source]¶
GetSegment(label)[source]¶

Return a PointSubSet object from the points in segment labeled “label” in case there are no points with the given label return None (and NOT an empty SubSet)

Parameters:label (int) – the label
Returns:subset of the points that are segmented as the label
Return type:PointSubSet
